title: Silent Hill Homecoming
notes: Runs with native like performance and no glitches. Note the game has a bug when setting screen resolution, if you end up with no video you have to edit the file "/Silent Hill Homecoming/Engine/vars_pc.cfg" manually with the correct resolution. Note that this problem occurs on actual windows too.

great performance, stable 30 fps with occasional stutter and fps dip, slider for display brightness doesn't work, display area for displaying map and inspecting objects are cut off on the bottom, to view part of the map that are cut off, you have to zoom in and scroll
title: Silent Hill Homecoming

notes: Some hiccups that exists on windows version too, Xbox 360 gamepad works.
title: Silent Hill Homecoming

notes: Sound is buggy, but rated "Platinum" because it's at least as buggy in Windows.
title: Silent Hill Homecoming

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 620 (Kaby Lake GT2)
title: Silent Hill Homecoming
